name: Dolo
description: Dolo 650 tablet is used to treat pain, fever, headaches, toothaches, migraines, body aches, and fever.It contains paracetamol

name: Azithromycin
description: Azithromycin belongs to the class of macrolide antibiotics. It works by killing bacteria or preventing their growth.

name: Pyrigesic
description: Pyrigesic Tablet helps relieve pain and fever by blocking the release of certain chemical messengers responsible for fever and pain.

name: Montela-L
description: Montela-L Tablet is a combination of two medicines: Levocetirizine and Montelukast, which relieves sneezing and runny nose due to allergies.

name: doxy
description: Doxy Tablet is an antibiotic medicine used to treat bacterial infections in your body

name: Adderall
description: Adderall commonly used to treat attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD).

name: Amlodipine
description: Amlodipine is a calcium channel blocker used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension)

name: Ativan
description: Ativan 1mg Tablet is used to treat anxiety disorders such as generalized anxiety disorder
